p: The alignment is produced using the profile alignment option in the ClustalW software [ 40], such that the query sequence is added to the existing alignment of reference sequences. Subsequent to the alignment, a Neighbor Joining phylogenetic tree, with 100 bootstrap replicates, is constructed. The tree is constructed using the HKY distance metric with gamma among-site rate variation, as implemented in the PAUP* software [ 34]. The query sequence is assigned to a particular genotype if it clusters monophyletically with that genotype clade with bootstrap support >70%. If the bootstrap support is <70%, the genotype is reported to be unassigned.
